name: GetRelatedTags
description:
Retrieve related tags for Users, Teams, or Escalation Policies.

Use this tool to get tags associated with specific Users, Teams, or Escalation Policies in Pagerduty. Tags help in filtering these entities. Requires 'tags.read' OAuth scope.

parameters.name: entity_type
parameters.description: The type of entity (users, teams, or escalation_policies) related to the tag to be retrieved.

value_schema.description: Type of entity related with the tag

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the resource you want to retrieve tags for, such as a User, Team, or Escalation Policy.

parameters.name: versioning_accept_header
parameters.description: Specify the version of the API response format using this header.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specify the content type for the request. Only 'application/json' is supported.

parameters.name: results_per_page_limit
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return per page.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page.

parameters.name: pagination_offset
parameters.description: Offset to start pagination of search results. Useful for navigating through pages of results.

value_schema.description: Offset to start pagination search results.

parameters.name: include_total_in_pagination
parameters.description: Set to true to include the total count of results in pagination responses. Defaults to false for faster response times.

value_schema.description:
By default the `total` field in pagination responses is set to `null` to provide the fastest possible response times. Set `total` to `true` for this field to be populated.

See our [Pagination Docs](https://developer.pagerduty.com/docs/rest-api-v2/pagination/) for more information.
